data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bota-Sierra, Cornelio Andrés, Novelo-Gutiérrez, Rodolfo (2017): The genus Heteragrion (Odonata: Zygoptera) in Northwestern Colombia, with the description of Heteragrion tatama sp. nov. Zootaxa 4347 (3): 553-571, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.3.8|45 occurrences
